channel.title: DNS nameserver 10.139.1.1
channel.description:
What are the DNS servers listed in `/etc/resolv.conf`? ``` nameserver 10.139.1.1 nameserver 10.139.1.2 ``` These are virtual IP addresses, **how do they work**?
I didn't find this IPs in a local network, firewall, /etc/hosts, systemd-resolved, unbound. No info in the kicksecure wiki, anything. **How does it work?**
``` [user ~]% traceroute 10.139.1.1 ... 27 * * * 28 * * * 29 * * * 30 * * * ```
